article.title: punctuation in quote
article.content: “Somebody once told me.” “The world was gonna roll me!” “I ain’t the sharpest tool in the shed,” ‘She was looking kinda dumb,’ ‘with her finger and her thumb!’ ‘in the shape of an L on her forehead.’ “Well:” ‘the years start coming;’ “and they don’t stop coming:” ‘fed to the rules;’ ‘and i hit the ground running,’
